posts.Content:
Week 2 of @_nightsweekends s5

Building Authentication of Workout Buddy Web App.

Last 2 days I worked on:
1. Setting the Initial Auth Status to keep the user logged in.
2. Building a toy version of my idea.

Week 2 of @_nightsweekends s5

Learning MERN Stack from Net Ninja's Playlist. Building Authentication of Workout Buddy Web App.

Today I worked on a custom useLogin hook to log users in to the app.

Week 2 of @_nightsweekends s5

Learning MERN Stack from Net Ninja's Playlist. Building Authentication of Workout Buddy Web App.

Today I worked on useLogout hook to log users out of the app.

Week 1 of @_nightsweekends s5

Learning MERN Stack from Net Ninja's Playlist. Building Authentication of Workout Buddy Web App.

Today I submitted s5 week #1 update and worked on reusable useSignup hook to signup new users to the app.

Week 1 of @_nightsweekends s5

Learning MERN Stack from Net Ninja's Playlist. Building Authentication of Workout Buddy Web App.

Today I worked on Signup and Login forms.

Week 1 of @_nightsweekends s5

Learning MERN Stack from Net Ninja's Playlist. Building Authentication of Workout Buddy Web App.

Today I created global user state using React Context that is available to entire app.

Learning MERN Stack from Net Ninja's Playlist. Building Authentication of Workout Buddy Web App.

Today I worked on static login method in backend API.

Learning MERN Stack from Net Ninja's Playlist. Building Authentication of Workout Buddy Web App.

Today I learned about signing tokens and sending them back to the client.

Learning MERN Stack from Net Ninja's Playlist. Building Authentication of Workout Buddy Web App.

Today I learned about JSON Web Tokens (JWT).

Learning MERN Stack from Net Ninja's Playlist. Building Authentication of Workout Buddy Web App.

Today I worked on Email and Password validation in backend API.

Learning MERN Stack from Net Ninja's Playlist. Building Authentication of Workout Buddy Web App.

Today I worked on:
1. Static signup method.
2. Password hashing.
3. Testing signup route using postman.

Learning MERN Stack from Net Ninja's Playlist. Building Authentication of Workout Buddy Web App.

Today I worked on the controller, model, and routes for user authentication.

Learning MERN Stack from Net Ninja's Playlist. Building Workout Buddy Web App.

Today I learned to format the date of workout creation using date-fns package and added material icons.

Learning MERN Stack from Net Ninja's Playlist. Building Workout Buddy Web App.

Today I learned to handle error responses in WorkoutForm component.

Learning MERN Stack from Net Ninja's Playlist. Building Workout Buddy Web App.

Today I learned about:
1. Deleting single workout document by making fetch request to Backend API.
2. Updating the global context state so that UI updates with new state.

Learning MERN Stack from Net Ninja's Playlist.

Today I learned about:
1. Creating a React Context to provide global workouts state to entire React application.
2. Creating custom useWorkoutsContext hook to access and update the global context state.

Learning MERN Stack from Net Ninja's Playlist. Building Workout Buddy Web App.

Today I worked on WorkoutForm component to add new workouts to the Database.

Learning MERN Stack from Net Ninja's Playlist.

Today I worked on:
1. Home component to fetch workouts data from Backend API and used proxy field in package.json file to avoid CORS issue.
2. WorkoutDetails component to show details of each workout.

Learning MERN Stack from Net Ninja's Playlist. Started frontend React part.

Today I worked on:
1. Routing System for Workout Buddy MERN app.
2. Home component.
3. Reusable Navbar component.

Learning MERN Stack from Net Ninja's Playlist

Today I learned to create controller functions to delete and update single document.

Learning MERN Stack from Net Ninja's Playlist

Today I learned to create controller functions for API routes.

Learning MERN Stack from Net Ninja's Playlist

Today I learned about:
1. Creating models and schemas for database collection using mongoose.
2. Creating a new document using mongoose and testing it using postman.

Learning MERN Stack from Net Ninja's Playlist

Today I learned about:
1. Setting up MongoDB Atlas.
2. Using mongoose to connect with MongoDB database.

Learning MERN Stack from Net Ninja's Playlist

Today I learned about:
1. Express Router.
2. API Routes.

Learning MERN Stack from Net Ninja's Playlist

Today I learned about:
1. Setting up express app.
2. Express Middleware.
3. Using environment variables to store sensitive information.
4. Using postman to simulate requests and test routes.

Finished working on Expenses chart component challenge by @frontendmentor

1. Expenses can be viewed by hovering over each bar.
2. Current day's bar is highlighted in different color.
3. The size of bars are dynamically calculated from JSON file.

Finished working on the last project from #JavaScript30 challenge by @wesbos

Today I learned to make a Whack-A-Mole game where players can score by clicking on the disappearing moles within 10 seconds.

Link: https://junayedrahaman50.github.io/JavaScript30/30-Whack-A-Mole/
